mapper.sql: product_id, product_no, image_url, product_name, product_size, attach_info, product_cate_id, product_cate_name, product_desc, flag, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into t_product
product_id,
product_no,
image_url,
product_name,
product_size,
attach_info,
product_cate_id,
product_cate_name,
product_desc,
flag,
create_time, update_time,
#{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{productNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{productSize,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{attachInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{productCateId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{productCateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{productDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{flag,jdbcType=BIT},
now(),now(),
mapper.update:
update t_product
product_no = #{productNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image_url = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_size = #{productSize,jdbcType=CHAR},
attach_info = #{attachInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_cate_id = #{productCateId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
product_cate_name = #{productCateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_desc = #{productDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=BIT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = now(),
where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_product set product_no = #{productNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_url = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_size = #{productSize,jdbcType=CHAR}, attach_info = #{attachInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_cate_id = #{productCateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, product_cate_name = #{productCateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_desc = #{productDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_product where product_no = #{productNo} and flag = 1

SELECT a.product_id,b.product_no,b.image_url, b.product_name, b.product_size, b.attach_info, b.product_cate_id, b.product_cate_name, b.product_desc, b.flag, b.create_time, b.update_time,c.unit_name FROM t_production_content a LEFT JOIN t_product b ON a.product_id = b.product_id LEFT JOIN t_unit c ON c.unit_id = a.product_unit_id WHERE a.production_id = #{productionId}
